name: GW – Project
description:
GW - Project and a small initiative to develop small game based on the old Game & Watch Nintendo. The proposal and the games have a theme that denounces any problems of the region where we live.

Currently has two games implemented:

  1. Resist and Refuse
  2. Blocked Street

Credits:

  • Concept and Design: Marcelo Melo
  • Game Design and Programming: Saulo Daniel
